Application.Name: NMTDVR
Application.Author: journey4712
Application.Description: Automated Tv Show and Movie Downloads via Usenet and Torrent.

Application.Name: TorrentWatch
Application.Author: journey4712
Application.Description: Enabled automatic downloading of torrents using RSS/Atom feeds.

Application.Name: Mono.Wrapper
Application.Author: journey4712
Application.Description: This program is called mono.wrapper. When used together with a static jukebox like YAMJ or MLMJ stored on your internal disk you will no longer have to worry about a share being mounted to play a video off of it. The software is configured to work with all configured NMT shares, NFS and SMB.

Application.Name: lighttpd
Application.Author: journey4712
Application.Description: lighttpd replaces the web server on port 9999. The effect is that any php program that runs on port 9999 will run much faster than through the stock NMT webserver. Any application that runs entirely on port 9999 should have a much snappier/faster interface. Requests that used to take a second or two should be shortened to a (large)fraction of a second. The programmers using lighttpd also have more development options(image generation/manipulation, https support, debugging support, xml transformation via xslt, more) than they did with the stock php server.
